name: Escalope de Veau
recipe: Escalope de Veau is a classic dish made by coating thinly sliced veal in breadcrumbs, then frying it until golden brown and crispy, resulting in a tender and flavorful meat dish.

name: Roast Duck Breast
recipe: Roasted duck breast (served pink) with gratin potato and a griottine cherry sauce

name: Roasted Pork Belly
recipe: Roasted Pork Belly is a succulent dish made by marinating and seasoning pork belly, then roasting it until the skin turns crispy and the meat becomes tender and juicy

name: Fish Parmentier
recipe: Fish Parmentier is a delicious dish consisting of layers of cooked fish, creamy mashed potatoes, and a flavorful sauce baked to perfection
